TextAsset.value: C’mon, Taira…
You can talk to me, can’t you?
Excuse me!
(He won’t say a word to me…
I’m mad at him for being a bully, but…)
Haha, what a drama queen.
Dumb ol’ Taira’s probably just skipping to go hit himself in the head with a wrestleball or something.
Yes, even a perfunctory glance of the data collected from observing him would suggest a pattern of behaviors indicating subnormal intellect.
Yeah… what he said!
Oh c’mon guys, lay off.
Oh! Was I wrong to infer from your interactions that there is currently friction between Taira and yourself?
Yeah, aren’t you mad at the big lug?
I… I am mad, but…
There’s more to him than you’re making it seem.
Actually… please excuse me!
Good luck, cutie!
(I’ve got to find Taira.)
(I’ve got to be smart here…
If I don’t find Taira, he might do something dumb.
I’ve got to really think about all the places he could’ve gone…
Search them systematically…
Go by process of elimination…)
Sniff… Sniff…
(...Of course.
He’s in the most obvious place he could’ve possibly been in.)
Sniff!
Hey, big guy…
What’s up?
Sniff…
Oh, ${slot:playerName}…
Of all the wrestleball courts in all the school-
You had to walk into mine.
There’s... only one wrestleball court in the school.
Sigh…
What’s even the point of being good at Wrestleball if I can’t even win you over with it…
Taira, jeez.
You’re acting like it’s all out of your control!
But the only person to blame for you being a bully…
is YOU!
Everybody always says I’m stupid.
And yo… I guess I really must be.
Cuz you keep telling me I’m a mean bully, and…
I just don’t get it!
I’m trying to do what I’m supposed to do!
Get revenge, honor my fallen clan…
But something’s missing…
Something’s gotta be missing…
If doing what I’m “supposed to do” makes the person I love hate me!
“Person you… love?!”
Geez Taira…
Isn’t that a little fast?!
No way, Cuz!
You’re the awesomest!
Even if you ARE a nerdy weakling!
Taira…
I need to understand you, and I think...
I think in order to do that, you need to tell me about your clan.
Yeah, alright… I guess it’s about time.
So like… a while ago?
I was this hardcore samurai dude, and I had this awesome clan of other hardcore samurai dudes.
We were like a Wrestleball team, but like…
maybe 50 times more rad than that.
Maybe even a hundred times more rad, if you can believe that!
It…
Seems impossible…
I know, right?
It blows my OWN mind sometimes.
But anyways…
One day, me and my clan got totally betrayed and slaughtered by this OTHER clan, who we THOUGHT was totally chill.
But they weren’t chill. They were un-chill.
They killed us all…
It was mad tragic, yo.
But even though I was totally dead…
My warrior heart kept beating in my cold, lifeless chest.
It beat a fire into me….
A fire that ignited my body back into a hot fury of LIFE, yo!
A fire that could never be extinguished…
The fire… of revenge.
Oh…
Oh Taira…
Omigosh, I’m so sorry.
That’s awful!
REALLY
awful!
I had no idea!
Yeah, it sucked pretty bad, not gonna lie.
Anyway, that’s why I go by my clan name “Taira”, instead of my real name, “Kagekiyo”.
It’s mad honorable and junk.
Were you ever able to find them?
The clan that betrayed you, I mean…
Were you ever able to get your revenge?
Huh?
Oh!
Haw haw!
${slot:playerName}, you’re so slow sometimes.
Yeah, I got revenge!
That was like… a thousand years ago or something.
I revenged those suckers UP.
I’m over it now, yo!
O-oh…
I guess that’s good!
But, um, you still go into your revenge-rages…
Of course I do, dummy!
Revenge isn’t just something I did cuz I had to.
I also just LOVE doing revenge!
So I just kept on gettin’ revenge for any kinda stuff I could think of.
And that way, I never have to STOP avenging my fallen clan!
They gotta be at least, like, a billion times more avenged by now.
I dunno exactly how much…
Math’s not really my strong suit.
Taira…
I don’t think…
No, actually I’m sure.
That’s definitely not how revenge works.
I’m just sayin-
Yeah? What ARE you saying?
You think you’re so smart, just cuz you’re not dumb like me...
You think I don’t know you got something to say.
So what is it, yo?
I don’t know how to revenge?
I haven't been avenging my clan all this time?
Urk….
I’ve been wandering the earth a thousand years, wasting my time?
Is that what you want to say to me, ${slot:playerName}?
Go ahead!
You think you’re always sooo smart...
Maybe you think my clan’s not WORTH avenging!
Is that it, yo?!
Aaaahh!!
SPIT IT OUT!
Taira! If you got revenge on the clan that betrayed you…
That means your clan is already avenged!
It’s over!
You can’t be avenged a hundred times- not even twice!
Revenge doesn’t just mean beating up people for whatever reason you can think of!
None of that has anything to do with your clan!
That’s not how revenge works!
You…
You suck at revenge!
Why didn’t anybody ever TELL me that?!
...Phew!
Now that I think about it…
That stuff you’re sayin’ makes a lotta sense.
Huh…
I really am an idiot.
I don’t think you’re an idiot, Taira.
You just didn’t know any other way to act…
And who could blame you for that?
Your whole clan was dead, you didn’t have anybody to help you.
And I think maybe you’re a little scary…
So after that, nobody wanted to tell you you were wrong.
I thought revenge was my thing…
First in line on my top three favorite hobbies list.
I thought it was the only thing I was really good at.
Even Wrestleball…
I’m only good at that cuz it’s a mad revenge-y sport.
Uh… What was the third awesome hobby?
(SIGH)
...Eating food.
Is eating food “revenge-y”, too?
${slot:playerName}, I’m like…
Totally undead!
I don’t need to eat food.
I only said that cuz all the cool kids do it and I just wanted to impress you.
Aw, Taira…
But see?
That’s just another reason why I’m a big, dumb fake!
Not just about eating food…
Even about revenge, my favorite thing.
It turns out, I totally suck at it!
I have no idea what revenge really is…
I’ve just been hurting innocent people.
My clan... would be mad ashamed.
You’re being really hard on yourself…
${slot:playerName}, you don’t get it.
I thought I had a warrior heart.
And I thought you had a fragile, delicate soul…
A soul I was destined to protect.
And maybe also take to the movies and stuff.
(I can’t tell whether to be flattered or not…
Probably not?)
I thought I could impress you with my hot muscles and my awesome revenge skills.
But…
It turns out, I don’t actually have any of those things.
...except for the hot muscles.
I actually totally suck at revenge.
And you…
You were the only one in a thousand years…
who was ever brave enough to tell me that.
You’re the one who REALLY has a warrior heart, ${slot:playerName}…
You’re way more awesome than I could ever be.
Oh, Taira…
I’m the one with the wimpy, fragile, sakura petal soul after all.
Wimpy?
But that’s the one you said you thought I had-
I’m not worthy of you, ${slot:playerName}!
I’m sorry…
We can’t date after all!
I didn’t even say you could date me in the first place!
Don’t waste your pretty words on me, yo!
${slot:playerName}…
You are the warrior with the burning heart…
And now I say to you…
GOODBYE!
…That guy doesn’t do anything halfway, does he.
Still though…
I didn’t think I had feelings for him, but…
Watching him run away like that…
Saying goodbye forever…
It hurts me way more than I thought it would.
Whoah! Pac-Man!
Am I glad to see you!
Be true to yourself!
Pac-Man…
You’re usually right, but…
How do I be true to myself?
What does that mean?
I guess Taira would say…
Being true to myself means being true to my “warrior heart”.
I don’t really know what to make of that stuff…
But he also said that he was the “delicate soul”.
And…
And the warrior heart..
Is destined to protect the delicate soul!
That’s it!
I know what I have to do…
Taira needs me.
Thank you, Pac-Man!
Thank you so much!
These kids today, with their roleplays and their larps and their TCGs.
I don’t get it, but bless their little hearts.
